Jonathan Ott
dcterms:description: A betting game domain where the agent starts with a certain amount of money and can place bets at each stage. The reward is the total money after a series of betting stages, with the probability of winning modeled using a beta distribution.
dcterms:title: Betting Game Domain

dcterms:creator: Arthur Guez
Nicolas Heess
David Silver
Peter Dayan
dcterms:description: An autonomous car navigation domain where the car must navigate to a destination by choosing actions based on the type of road. The transition durations are modeled by Dirichlet distributions, and the agent receives rewards based on the time taken to traverse each road section.
dcterms:title: Autonomous Car Navigation Domain
